summary: Simple plugin that fixes the insane death physics caused by Giants
descriptionHtml:
Giants Physics Fixer

By TheReverendTholomewPlague

Version 1.0

[color=\"#FF0000\"][b]Due to \'popular\' demand, this file has been placed in the \'Bug Fixes\' category ;)[/b][/color]

This simple little mod attempts to fix the insane physics caused by Giants and their clubs by lowering the death force threshold.

Fully compatible with \'Realistic Physics and Force\'. The latter doesn\'t fix this issue so it\'s a great idea to run both mods :)

There shouldn\'t be any problems but if there are, PM me.

Installation is as simple as opening the archive and extracting GiantsPhysicsFix.esp to \"Skyrim\\Data\\\"
author: TheReverendTholomewPlague
